channel.title: Music – 시아(Sia)

item.title: 시아(Sia) - 12 Nights

item.title: 시아(Sia) - 3 Minutes 'Til New Years
item.description:
Whether you’re partying out
Whether you’re partying at home
Partying together or partying alone
It’s gonna be a happy new year in not too long
Come with me
This is my new years song
Just count baby
I’ll tell you when
I’ll tell you when and then we’re gonna scream
Balloons to burst
It’s December 31st
Balloons to burst
It’s December 31st

It’s December 31st

If you’ve had a happy year or a sad year
It’s a new year and there’s nothing to fear

There’s nothing to fear

We got balloons to burst

It’s gonna be a happy new year no doubt

and we’re gonna count down

item.title: 시아(Sia) - Naughty & Nice
item.description:
I can be naughty
And I can be nice
I can be naughty
And I can see in your eyes
That you can be naughty
So I won’t tell you twice
We can be naughty
I’m sugar you’re spice
Staying up late and writing wish lists
We’re staying up late
You might get your wish
If the mistletoe’s there
You might get a kiss
Cause Christmas is coming
So let’s take a risk
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
We’re sugar and spice
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
We’re sugar and spice
We can be naughty
And we can be nice
But if we want to please Santa
We better think twice
Cause we can be naughty at the roll of your dice
Oh we can be naughty
I’m sugar you’re spice
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
We’re sugar and spice
Naughty and nice
Naughty and nice
We’re sugar and spice
Naughty and nice

We’re sugar and spice
